name: Elephant's foot
description:
Play as the Blob, formed in the nuclear reactor’s core during a meltdown. You have to fight your way through the nuclear power plant, fighting guys in hazard suits trying to mow you down with water guns.

Warning! : this version is full of problems(turn down your volume, close manually)

How to play:

WASD - to move

TAB - open pause menu

Space - Shoot

Collect spheres to replenish your life

Avoid water streams

Avoid sprinklers and fire alarms

Credits:

JoelQ - code, level design

Dreadevil - code, game design, level design

Mikael Hyttinen aka jowy - 3D art & animations

Sleepygibbs - VFX
